about_the_game:
A captivating, creepy, and brutal VR horror first-person shooter with quests and weapons! Experience the onset of the Dark Invasion and get ready to survive the first episode of "Dark Invasion VR: Doomsday."

"Dark Invasion VR: Doomsday" is a horror VR shooter with a story-driven campaign and quests. Fight your way through a bunker infested with zombies, monsters, mutants, and aliens using melee weapons, handguns, shotguns, and rifles.

You play as John Beggart, a member of a reconstruction team working in an old bunker that survived World War II. John shivers as he enters the bunker, unaware that his world is about to collapse. He reminisces about playing hide and seek with Karen at this cursed place, 20 years ago—she got lost and was never found again.

No one was prepared for what happened next as the city was overrun by zombies, mutants, and aliens. As the apocalypse unfolds, our hero is in the old bunker. He must navigate his way through the underground basement and survive the full force of the violence from the undead army of the Dark Invasion!

Take control of the situation, fight as John in VR, and find a way out of this cursed place.

Quests, zombies, and weapons!

Fast-paced action VR horror shooter
Adventure elements and quests
Combat with melee weapons, ranged weapons, and grenades
Story-driven campaign
Best horror 3D surround sound
Limb dismemberment, violence, and blood
Free locomotion
Room scaling
Be the hero

We plan to develop an episodic player experience:

Episode 1: Bunker Doomsday is included in the current version. We plan to add more maps, quests, bosses, and story elements in the upcoming updates.
Episode 2: The City. We are planning and already working on a city overrun by zombies with various locations and quests.
Episode 3: The Alien Ship. We plan to add Episode 3 soon after completing Episode 2.

We plan to introduce boss fights and mid-boss fights to the game with later updates.

A violent and brutal VR first-person shooter with a creepy story, zombies, guns, and quests.

At a later date we plan to add a skill system and customizable weapons, as well as many other improvements.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains violence, blood, gore and dismemberment. Some people could get feared by the horrific mutants, zombies, monsters and aliens. It also contains jump scares, be sure that you got enough space around you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: CPU: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Standing or Room Scale

short_description: A terrifying, brutal horror VR shooter adventure with quests, zombies, mutants, and guns! At the onset of the apocalypse, you find yourself inside an old bunker. You must fight your way with full force through the ranks of the undead army of the Dark Invasion to find a way out of that forsaken place
